data.description:
Sharpen your spray painting skills or learn how to be a spray painter on a wide variety of true-to-life items – virtually.  No prep work, no paint, no disposal costs and no mess! 
Experienced spray gun manufacturers, spray painters, and trainers have come together to ensure that SagolaSPRAY™ bridges the gap between the classroom and the spray booth – enhancing the training experience, not hindering it.
Select from a wide range of realistic, full-size automotive and industrial model items, pick a colour and start painting.
Using clear visual guides, SagolaSPRAY™ teaches you the key spray painting techniques you need; learn the correct gun-to-object distance, spray gun angle, spray speed, fan pattern overlap, and much more. 
No more waiting for booth availability - virtually spray objects from the real world and get performance scores on distance, gun angle, spray speed & paint thickness uniformity – allowing you to see how you improve over time. 
SagolaSPRAY™, the SEMA 2022 global award-winning app, helps get you ‘spray booth ready’ – from the comfort of your home or learning environment.
